dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Everything—I’ll burn it all… and my whole disgusting life, too.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: So it’s you. Have you slept well? As for me… sleep wouldn’t come.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: I don’t feel like eating. You should take off your mask and have a nice meal.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Have you ever been afraid of dreaming? …I wish I were like you.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Ever since I realized that my life had been intertwined with disgusting beings, my every memory haunts me as its own nightmare.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: I burned and scorched them away… I saw them turn to ashes before my eyes, yet they still torment me.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: …She is right—I must carry out more purification… That will then purify my mind with certainty.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: I skewered sixteen today. Tomorrow, I will nail and cremate twice as many. Huhu… It gets fun as you keep at it, doesn’t it?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: The power to cleanse filth with fire… Indeed, it was certainly a good idea to listen to her.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: …If you have nothing to say, then may I go see her now?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: This doesn’t really feel special. I have… always had talent… as the chosen one.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I’ll wrest them upon stakes.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: To purge the grounds with fire, and build anew a clean world.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I’m busy right now.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Unto the fire.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: …Good.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Huch!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: …Go down in flames.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Was this… not the answer…?

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: That wasn’t troublesome at all.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Tsk, I knew that wouldn’t work.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: I think… I did well enough to be acknowledged by her.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: It’s only natural. Because I… am the chosen one… Isn’t that right?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Scheiße, just how did—? Grrmgh…
